name: Stone Skipping
description:
Stone Skipping is a calming stone-skipping expirience for the "A Game By It's Cover 2015" Jam.

Your goal is to skip your stone as far as possible on the unsettled sea.

The game is based on cover art by SANAGRAPH.

Current Version: 1.1

-New! Stone Skipping adjusts itself to your display-ratio

-New! Added a few subtle animations

-More fair and balanced gameplay
